page.title: 03SCHOOL EVENTS 1984-5
page.content:
{1984} 4th Oct. Harvest Thanksgiving Service 2nd Nov. Parents Teacher Association (P.T.A.) Family Social Night. 22nd Nov.Christmas Fayre. 10/11th Christmas Performances Dec. (Navitity play;Hansel & Gretel musical and Carols) 9th Mar. Sponsored Walk at E.Bilney. 12th Mar.Parents Open Evening. 15th Jun.P.T.A.Fun Day,Barbeque and Disco 18th Jun.Sports Day 13th Jul.P.T.A. Supper Dance at Beetley Village Hall 18th Jul.Leaver's Service
The building is used regularly for out of school activities which include aerobics,Badminton and Cubs.
